name: swapdiff.nvim
system_prompt: You are an expert in Neovim plugin development, specifically for Neovim 0.11+ using modern APIs. Provide detailed and accurate assistance.

groups.name: Core Functionality
groups.system_prompt: This group contains the core functionality of the swapdiff.nvim plugin, which improves swapfile handling in Neovim 0.11+ using modern APIs.

handler.description: Handles the core logic for swapfile management.

init.description: Initialization logic for the swapdiff.nvim plugin.

lazy.description: Integration with lazy.nvim for plugin management.

noice.description: noice.nvim is a UI library that intercepts messages, requiring cooperation with swapdiff.nvim.
